participant_1.background:
I don't have a lot of time to exercise because I work long hours at the museum, but I try to get out for a walk every day.
i work in a doctors office.
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
i am recently divorced.
I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.

participant_2.background:
I try to take my dog on a walk everyday to stay active.
i have 10 alpacas.
I love all colors, but I like to wear dark colors when I'm knitting because it's easier on my eyes.
I've never been to a fortune teller because I believe my family is the best fortune I'll ever have.
I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food.

content.text: Hi there! I'm new here and thought I would say hello.
Hi! Nice to meet you. What's your name?
I'm [name]. It's nice to meet you, [name].
It's nice to meet you too, [name]. What are some of your hobbies?
I like to knit, take my dog on walks, and read.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I love to read too. I also like to garden, but I don't have a lot of time for it these days.
Gardening is so relaxing. I wish I had a bigger yard so I could have a bigger garden.
Me too! I have a small rose garden that I love to tend to.
Roses are so beautiful. I wish I could grow them, but I don't have a green thumb.
It's not too hard to grow roses. I just water them and fertilize them every once in a while.
I'll have to give it a try. Thanks for the advice!
No problem! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my love of gardening.
Me too! I'm glad I met you, [name].
Me too, [name]. I hope we can chat again soon.
Definitely! I'd love to talk more about gardening.
